snippet: Taylor Swift took the next step in a constantly evolving game of album promotion by pop stars when she announced the release of her new “1989.”
abstract: Taylor Swift demonstrates her mastery of online media as she releases new music video and announces release date for her next album.
lead_paragraph: Taylor Swift took the next step in a constantly evolving game of album promotion by pop stars when she announced the release of her new “1989.”

headline.main: Taylor Swift Maximizes Use of Social Media in Release of New Album
headline.print_headline: In Release, Taylor Swift Maximizes Social Media
